pros: great benifits an supervisor was understanding

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Saint Pete, FL

pros:
Decent Facility
Convenient Parking
Newly Remodeled
Free Soda if you like that stuff
Free burnt tasting instant Folders Coffee
cons:
-Decent Pay, Poor Pay if they think you're desperate
-They Offer Benefits,  Inquire about the benefits.  Just because they say they offer health insurance or tuition reimbursement doesn't mean they are good benefits
-you can't bring outside drinks or food other than the break room which is downstairs.  if you are in Nursing you are not downstairs so this is horrible as you can't really access your drinks, food or snacks.
-training/orientation was just sitting in a room and watching videos.  questions may be answered in the form or, that was covered in the video!  (maybe, but I still have questions, which were not answered)
-If you are offered less than $12/hr as a CNA do not bother.
